publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3297 David McLetchie: Scottish Banknotes (Acceptability in the United kingdom) Bill—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that David Mundell MP is to introduce a Private Member’s Bill in the UK Parliament to make provision for the acceptability of Scottish banknotes throughout the United Kingdom. Supported by: John Lamont*, Murdo Fraser*, Ted Brocklebank*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bill Aitken*, Bill Kidd*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jamie McGrigor*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Mitchell*, John Scott*
S3M-3297 Scottish Banknotes (Acceptability in the United kingdom) Bill (lodged on 23 January 2009) Mike Pringle*, Gavin Brown*
S3M-3297 Scottish Banknotes (Acceptability in the United kingdom) Bill (lodged on 23 January 2009) Mary Scanlon*, Stuart McMillan*, Annabel Goldie*
